title: Rune questions for the powers that be
body:
I am curious as to the interaction of Press the Attack with Yi passive and Rageblade.

I would also like to know how Summon Aerie and Arcane Comet proc (if at all) with traps or minions, such as Teemo shrooms or Zyra plants.

Thank you for your time!

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
